page.title: 02THE VILLAGE OF SUDBOROUGH
page.content: Sudborough is a small quiet, village of 140 people containing few amenities. The houses in Sudborough are both new and old. Many of the old houses in Sudborough are cottages. There is also a pub"The Vane Arms", which is opposite the church and next to the small post office. There is a "Round House" at the end of the village.This was once a toll house and dates from 1660. Also the famous author B.B lives here. The new houses are made of the same stone as the old houses were,so they don't look out of place in the village.
